LanguageData.XFMParmor_PartArmor.label: mechframe armor
LanguageData.XFMParmor_PartArmor.description: This component forms the chassis of mechframes. It is also needed for repairing damaged frames.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_PartControl.label: mechframe control module
LanguageData.XFMParmor_PartControl.description: Component that recognizes pilot's input, processes and output it as adequate control signal.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_PartShield.label: mechframe shield generator
LanguageData.XFMParmor_PartShield.description: Powerful shield generator that protects the mechframe, takes time to charge up.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_PartWeapon.label: mechframe weaponry
LanguageData.XFMParmor_PartWeapon.description: Anything weapon related, from barrels, receivers, magazines to weapon mounts.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_PartEnergy.label: mechframe power core
LanguageData.XFMParmor_PartEnergy.description: The center piece of mechframe, powers and integrates different parts into a harmonious entity.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Drone_Carrier.label: mecha drone
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Drone_Carrier.description: A quad drone manufactured by carrier mechframe's internal forge. Accepts certain simple commands and will return to carrier when battery depletes.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Drone_Carrier.tools.0.label: left rotor blade
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Drone_Carrier.tools.1.label: right rotor blade
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ModuleSupply.label: field supply ration
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ModuleSupply.description: Prefabricated, packaged food and hormone that fulfills pilot's sleeping and eating needs. Though this is not a complete substitute of actual bed rest.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_UnfilledPowerCell.label: mechframe battery
LanguageData.XFMParmor_UnfilledPowerCell.description: Mechframe battery that is not fully charged yet. Safety measures prevents batteries with less than optimal voltage to be used on mechframes.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_FilledPowerCell.label: filled mechframe battery
LanguageData.XFMParmor_FilledPowerCell.description: Completely charged and combat ready battery, can be used to rapidly replace spent batteries on mechframes.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_MechanicalArmorCore_Wreckage.d: Damaged mechframe core that is on the fringe of explosive disintergration. (Does not harm friendlies, configurable in mod setting)
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Wreckage_Falling.label: falling wreckage
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Wreckage_Misc.label: falling wreckage
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Wreckage_OutQuest.label: falling wreckage
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Wreckage_Black.label: falling wreckage
